wf_activity.name: OLD TEMPLATE Send email to Storm

workflow_version.display_value: Skanska UK RITM EOL Order a Computer

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

[Order]
CustomerID<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>387 CustomerName<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Skanska CustomerHwPO<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>090/53171/E950 CustomerAcPO CostCentre<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${opened_by.cost_center} Date<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${sys_created_on} GeneralNotes<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.supplier_notes}
[/Order]
[OrderDeliveryAddress]
ContactName <mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script> ${variables.delivery_contact_fao} ContactNumber<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script> ${variables.delivery_contact_tel_no} AddressLine<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Skanska, ${variables.location_address} City<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.location_city} State<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.location_county} PostCode<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.location_post_code} Country<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>UK
[/OrderDeliveryAddress]
[OrderInvoiceAddress]
ContactName<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Finance Business Support ContactNumber<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>+44 1302 821100 AddressLine<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Skanska, Bentley House, Jossey Lane, Bentley City<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Doncaster State<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>South Yorkshire PostCode<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>DN5 9ED Country<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>UK
[/OrderInvoiceAddress]
[OrderLine]
Type <mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Hardware PartNo<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.itemID} Manufacturer<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script> ${workflow.scratchpad.itemManufacturer} Description<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.replacement_device} Quantity<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>1 UOM<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>EACH UnitPrice<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.itemPrice} TotalValue<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.itemPrice}
[/OrderLine]
[BuildRequest]
CallType<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>EOL Replacement ContactName<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Customer (Self Service) ContactEmail CustomerID<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>387 CustomerName<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Skanska Importance<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>0 CustomerRefNo<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.task1Number}
[/BuildRequest]
[BuildRequestLine]
Configuration<mail_script>template.space(20)</mail_script>Build New PC as per order, UserID= ${opened_by.u_ad_name}, ReplacementID=${variables.device_to_be_replaced}, Applications= HardWareDetails<mail_script>template.space(20)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.itemID} ${variables.replacement_device} SerialNo
[/BuildRequestLine]
[End]

[Order]
CustomerID<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>387 CustomerName<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Skanska CustomerHwPO<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>090/53171/E950 CustomerAcPO CostCentre<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${opened_by.cost_center} Date<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${sys_created_on} GeneralNotes<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.supplier_notes}
[/Order]
[OrderDeliveryAddress]
ContactName <mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script> ${variables.delivery_contact_fao} ContactNumber<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script> ${variables.delivery_contact_tel_no} AddressLine<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Skanska, ${variables.location_address} City<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.location_city} State<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.location_county} PostCode<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.location_post_code} Country<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>UK
[/OrderDeliveryAddress]
[OrderInvoiceAddress]
ContactName<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Finance Business Support ContactNumber<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>+44 1302 821100 AddressLine<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Skanska, Bentley House, Jossey Lane, Bentley City<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Doncaster State<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>South Yorkshire PostCode<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>DN5 9ED Country<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>UK
[/OrderInvoiceAddress]
[OrderLine]
Type <mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Hardware PartNo<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.itemID} Manufacturer<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script> ${workflow.scratchpad.itemManufacturer} Description<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${variables.replacement_device} Quantity<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>1 UOM<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>EACH UnitPrice<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.itemPrice} TotalValue<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.itemPrice}
[/OrderLine]
[BuildRequest]
CallType<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>EOL Replacement ContactName<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Customer (Self Service) ContactEmail CustomerID<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>387 CustomerName<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>Skanska Importance<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>0 CustomerRefNo<mail_script>template.space(30)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.task1Number}
[/BuildRequest]
[BuildRequestLine]
Configuration<mail_script>template.space(20)</mail_script>Build New PC as per order, UserID= ${opened_by.u_ad_name}, ReplacementID=${variables.device_to_be_replaced}, Applications= HardWareDetails<mail_script>template.space(20)</mail_script>${workflow.scratchpad.itemID} ${variables.replacement_device} SerialNo
[/BuildRequestLine]
[End]

sys_variable_value.value:
Purchase Order Request

Client UID 387
Client Name Skanska
Hardware PO Reference 090/53171/E950
Accessories PO Reference
Cost Centre ${opened_by.cost_center}
Required Date ${workflow.scratchpad.created }
General Notes ${variables.supplier_notes}

Order Delivery Address

ContactName ${variables.delivery_contact_fao}
ContactNumber ${variables.delivery_contact_tel_no}
Address Line ${variables.location_address}
City ${variables.location_city}
State ${variables.location_county}
PostCode ${variables.location_post_code}
Country UK

Purchase Order Line Items

Type PartNo Manufacturer Description Quantity Unit Price
Hardware ${workflow.scratchpad.itemID} ${workflow.scratchpad.itemManufacturer} ${variables.replacement_device} 1 ${workflow.scratchpad.itemPrice}

Build Request

Call Type Build Request (EOL Replacement)
Contact Name Customer (Self Service)
Contact Email
Customer Unique Reference ${workflow.scratchpad.task1Number}
Configuration Build New PC as per order, UserID= ${request.requested_for.user_name}, ReplacementID=${variables.device_to_be_replaced}, Applications=
Hardware Details ${workflow.scratchpad.itemID} ${variables.replacement_device}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Accessories PO Reference

Required Date ${workflow.scratchpad.created }
General Notes ${variables.supplier_notes}

Order Delivery Address

ContactNumber ${variables.delivery_contact_tel_no}
Address Line ${variables.location_address}
City ${variables.location_city}
